thread.section_title: Breaking news on air travel - breakingnews.com
thread.title: FAA's statement on drone spotted near Douglas International Airport in Charlotte, NC: 'We are aware that there was a drone sighting Thursday. Our pilot contacted the FAA who reported it to police. They are both investigating the incident.' - @NBCNews
thread.title_full: FAA's statement on drone spotted near Douglas International Airport in Charlotte, NC: 'We are aware that there was a drone sighting Thursday. Our pilot contacted the FAA who reported it to police. They are both investigating the incident.' - @NBCNews

author: Shelley Ng
title: FAA's statement on drone spotted near Douglas International Airport in Charlotte, NC: 'We are aware that there was a drone sighting Thursday. Our pilot contacted the FAA who reported it to police. They are both investigating the incident.' - @NBCNews
text: Jul 11, 2015, 02:20 PM GMT ( 14:20 ) FAA's statement on drone spotted near Douglas International Airport in Charlotte, NC: 'We are aware that there was a drone sighting Thursday. Our pilot contacted the FAA who reported it to police. They are both investigating the incident.' - @NBCNews End of alert
